newsitem.title: USA: Host Marriott Corp completes tender offer.
newsitem.headline: Host Marriott Corp completes tender offer.

text.p: Host Marriott Corp said Thursday it completed its tender offer for limited partnership units in the Hanover Marriott Limited Partnership which owns the Hanover Marriott Hotel.
The company said the offering will result in the company's purchase of 40 units or 48 percent of the limited partnership units for $1.6 million or $40,000 per unit.
Combined with its general partner ownership position, the company said it now indirectly owns, through affiliates, over 50 percent of this partnership.
